DOC.criteria: Subject's from 18 years of age. Subject is indicated for Capsule Endoscopy procedure. Subject agrees to sign the Informed Consent Form. Female subject is pregnant. Subject is known or is suspected to suffer from intestinal obstruction (symptoms such as severe abdominal pain with accompanying nausea or vomiting). Subject has a pacemaker or other implanted electromedical device. Subject has any condition, which precludes compliance with study and/or device instructions, such as swallowing problems. Subject suffers from life threatening conditions. Subject is currently participating in another clinical study that may directly or indirectly affect the results of this study
